title: 820-3437 no audio
message: im kinda confused on this issue. Is the audio chip located on the small board together with the mag safe? I've checked U8040 has enable signal on out i also have PP1V5_S0SW_AUDIO also U6410 gets 5v but nothing on output also MAX98300_R_P and MAX98300_R_N are missing or they suppose to miss not sure. Any ideas ?

title: 820-3437 no audio
message: All audio is on the IO board besides the right speaker amp. Try known good IO board and cable first and check J9500 of course.
